welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Eastham, where the beautiful countryside meets the stunning coast. Get ready to experience the rich history, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality of our town. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, primarily used for budget airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving mainly low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport is responsible for handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
